test_cases.test_name: Air tickets - Booked tickets notification (tagging LM when not in approval flow OR workflow on ticket requests)
test_cases.description: Verify that notification/tagging UI elements are present for line managers in air ticket request workflow when they are outside standard approval flow
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.test_name: FE: Show remaining air tickets when balance is on hold due to booking request
test_cases.description: Verify that remaining air ticket balance is displayed on UI when a booking request is in progress/pending
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.test_name: FE: Unclear indication of available air ticket requests
test_cases.description: Verify that air ticket request display clearly shows available requests (not ambiguous notation like '0/1')
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify air ticket balance and request availability display is clear and accurate. Test that remaining balance shows correctly when booking requests are pending, and that request notation (e.g., '0/1') is unambiguous and clearly communicates available requests.
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

task_flows.flow_name: Request Air Ticket via Mobile App
steps: Check existing ticket requests and balance
Choose request type (Reimbursement, HR/Admin Booking, or Encashment)
Navigate to Settings > Company > Air ticket policies
Configure policy behavior (request timing, renewal cycle, request limits)
Choose redeem options (Reimbursement, Encashment, Company Booking)
task_flows.source_article: Setting up an air ticket allowance policy

task_flows.flow_name: Set Up Air Ticket Auto Encashment Workflow
steps: Select Air Tickets Auto Encashment Recipe
Set request details (choose Bayzat Payroll application)
task_flows.source_article: Air Tickets Auto Encashments via Workflows

task_flows.flow_name: Request Air Ticket via Mobile App
steps: Choose request type (Reimbursement, HR/Admin Booking, or Encashment)
Enter basic policy details (name, allowance amount)
Configure policy behavior (request timing, renewal cycle, request limits)
Choose redeem options (Reimbursement, Encashment, Company Booking)
task_flows.source_article: Setting up an air ticket allowance policy

task_flows.flow_name: Create Air Ticket Auto Encashment Workflow
steps: Select Air Tickets Auto Encashment Recipe
Set request details (choose application as Bayzat Payroll, select request type, assign employee)
task_flows.source_article: Air Tickets Auto Encashments via Workflows

duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify air ticket balance and request availability display is clear and accurate. Test that remaining balance shows correctly when booking requests are pending, and that request notation (e.g., '0/1') is unambiguous and clearly communicates available requests.

not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket describing system limitation (no indefinite carry-over). No UI change to test - this is a platform design constraint.

not_testable_tickets.summary: As an employee I want to manage my air ticket requests from my air tickets
not_testable_tickets.reason: Won't Do status - feature was rejected and will not be implemented

not_testable_tickets.summary: Client is unable to remove Processed Air tickets
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket. Issue was a system dependency workflow (payroll rejection required first), not a UI bug to test now.
Permission/role-based access control issue. Playwright cannot verify backend permission logic or data visibility restrictions across modules.

not_testable_tickets.summary: Letter requests - upload the document after stamping
not_testable_tickets.reason: Feature request for letter requests (not air tickets). Workflow involves external document stamping and re-upload capability - backend feature, not UI validation.

not_testable_tickets.summary: Limited access for employees to view other users
not_testable_tickets.reason: Employee visibility/grouping feature across HR modules. Playwright cannot verify backend permission logic or data filtering across modules.

not_testable_tickets.summary: Need to delete the test air tickets processed
not_testable_tickets.reason: Feature request for deletion capability of processed air tickets. Requires backend data deletion logic, not UI validation.

not_testable_tickets.summary: Need to remove processed (Encashment) Air tickets with Payroll reopen
not_testable_tickets.reason: Ticket is marked as Resolved - the issue has already been fixed and there is nothing to test now

not_testable_tickets.summary: Restricted People manager role - can still see other employees (out of assigned group)
not_testable_tickets.reason: This is a system limitation/design decision clarified by product team. Role-based grouping intentionally only applies to finance/payroll/expense modules, not HR modules. This is not a bug to fix but a documented product constraint, making it not testable as a defect

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
